Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a brown pottery ribbed vessel with base of one handle surviving, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394431) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394431)
